snippet: In agreeing to bury the bombing suspect Tamerlan Tsarnaev, a Worcester, Mass., funeral director had to answer an official’s questions as he struggled to find a cemetery.
abstract: Worcester, Mass, funeral director Peter A Stefan is struggling to find cemetery that will accept remains of Tamerlan Tsarnaev, deceased suspect in Boston Marathon bombings.
lead_paragraph: In agreeing to bury the bombing suspect Tamerlan Tsarnaev, a Worcester, Mass., funeral director had to answer an official’s questions as he struggled to find a cemetery.

headline.seo: Funeral Home Accepts Tsarnaev’s Body, and With It, Problems
headline.main: Funeral Home Accepts Suspect’s Body, and Problems
headline.print_headline: Funeral Home Accepts Body, And With It, Problems
